word_mean: 尸体解剖，尸体剖验：死后身体的检查，包括解剖后检查内部器官和结构，以便确定死亡的原因或病理改变的性质。又称necropsy

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent. (in the sense 'personal observation'): from French autopsie or modern Latin autopsia, from Greek, from autoptēs 'eyewitness', from autos 'self' + optos 'seen'

entry.def: An autopsy is an examination of a dead body by a doctor who cuts it open in order to try to discover the cause of death.

example.ex: The autopsy report gave the cause of death as poisoning.
example.tran: 验尸报告上显示死因为中毒。

means.word_mean: 1. an examination and dissection of a dead body to determine cause of death or the changes produced by disease
1. perform an autopsy on a dead body; do a post-mortem
